name: DownFall (itch) (sierra Studio)
description:
Make you way through space, dodging all obstacles that threaten your tiny little astronaut! It's a relatively simple game and it's also my first one - I made it after completing the Unity Creating with Code course. I've learnt so many skills through this project and hope to utilise them in my future game dev adventures.

This project is free of charge :) please leave constructive criticism for me so  I can improve.

Thanks!
